entry.title: Keep an eye on your favorite charts

div.p:
Click on the star at the top-right corner of a chart to save it in your Favorites. Then click on a favorite to see it in full size.
The favorites list is currently limited to a maximum of 6 charts.

div.h2: Different charts, different blockchains, one page

div.p:
With the favorites list, you can keep an eye on different charts over different blockchains.
Monitor Pancake/BNB on BSC, AAVE/COMP on Ethereum and WFTM/Spirit on Fantom, all on the same page!

entry.title: A secret beta version for secret features

div.h2: Secret features - but don't tell anyone !

div.p:
A Beta version is online, you can now test new secret features at https://dexpairs.xyz/beta !
New secret features may be awesome, but they also may still be buggued sometimes, keep this in mind when you're using the Beta version.

With this Beta version, I'll be able to test new design or implement new features, and test them in real life before pushing them to the regular website.
It's supposed to prevent unwanted bugs, and make the developments easier. ;)

The Wallet tracker can now explore ERC-721 transactions in order to find tokens.
ERC-721 tokens are also well known as ... NFTs !
Yes, your Non-Fungible Tokens are now displayed in the wallet !

div.h2: How can I view my NFTs ?

div.p:
To view a NFT, the contract has to respect the ERC-721 standard and must implement the optionnal tokenURI function. Just sit in your chair and let the Wallet search this for you !
Otherwise, use the contract address to find where to preview the NFT.

entry.title: Full support of Aave v2 protocol

div.h2: Track your Aave tokens on Ethereum and Polygon

div.p:
Aave v2 tokens are fully supported on Ethereum and Polygon !
Track your collateral tokens, monitor your borrowed assets, and your debt is taken into account in the global wallet value.

div.h2: Partial support of Compound and Venus

div.p:
Compound (Ethereum) and Venus (Binance Smart Chain) are partially supported.
Only collateral tokens have a value, the borrowed tokens don't have price yet.

This Atom feed will be used to briefly list each new functionnality implemented on DexPairs.xyz
Feel free to subscribe and be the first to discover the latest features !
Another way to know what's coming is to directly have a look at the Roadmap on GitHub
